title: Best of The Program | Guests: KT McFarland & Ken Alibek | 5/5/20
description:
We must get rid of the fear overtaking America. Nancy Pelosi would rather give people more government handouts than pass a payroll tax cut. Michael Flynn’s former deputy national security adviser, KT McFarland, joins to give her firsthand perspective on Flynn’s case. Former head of the Soviet Union’s biological weapons program and author of “Biohazard,” Ken Alibek, discusses how communist countries like China treat biotech much differently than the US.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
